data.eml:eml: New Oligaphorura species (Collembola: Onychiuridae) from the forests of East Asia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sun, Xin, Shveenkova, Yu. B., Xie, Zhijing, Babenko, A. B. (2019): New Oligaphorura species (Collembola: Onychiuridae) from the forests of East Asia. Zootaxa 4661 (2): 256-270, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4661.2.2
